Identity/Philia.description: Interaction is easy, comfortable, and friendly

Full Eros.description: Interaction is dynamic, stimulating, and full of mutual interest

Full Agape.description: Interaction is comfortable, harmonious, and mutually beneficial

Psychosophia Extinguishment.description: Interaction is distant, formal, and characterized by mutual respect

Neutrality.description: Interaction is neutral and polite but lacks deep understanding or connection

Mirage.description: Interaction is unpredictable, intense, and emotionally charged

Order/Full Order.description: Interaction is asymmetrical, with one partner taking a more active and dominant role

Revision.description: Interaction is challenging and confrontational, but can lead to growth

Therapy-Misunderstanding.description: Interaction is comfortable and easy due to shared values and worldviews

Therapy-Attraction.description: Interaction is asymmetrical, with one partner taking a more active and dominant role

Conflict Submission/Dominance.description: Interaction is characterized by power struggles and conflicts
